mapper.select: SELECT board_id, member_no, title, content, author, creation_date, view_count FROM bulletin_board ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{start};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bulletin_board (member_no, title, content, author, creation_date) VALUES (#{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{author}, #{creationDate})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM replies WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(reply_step), 0) FROM replies WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND reply_ref = #{replyRef} AND reply_level = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO replies ( board_id, member_no, author, creation_date, reply_title, reply_content, reply_ref, reply_step, reply_level ) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{memberNo}, #{author}, #{creationDate}, #{replyTitle}, #{replyContent}, #{replyRef}, #{replyStep}, #{replyLevel} )
